name: SkiSounds
0:
”Alexa open ski sounds”
”Alexa ask ski sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ski sounds
des:
Immerse yourself in the exhilarating world of skiing, anytime, anywhere, with our revolutionary Ski Sounds. Designed for ski enthusiasts and nature lovers alike, this skill brings the captivating sounds of the slopes directly to you. Experience the crisp swish of skis gliding over fresh powder, the gentle rustle of pine trees in the breeze, and the distant echo of snow-capped mountains. Perfect for relaxation, visualization, or getting pumped for your next ski adventure.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Ski Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
